about.title: About Sito Wallet
about.body:
At Sito Wallet, we believe managing your money should be easy and stress-free. That's why we offer an app where you can manage all your accounts, both digital and physical, in one place.

Created with care by <2>sito8943, our mission is to help you understand and organize your finances clearly, safely, and without complications.

And the best part: it's completely free. Because we believe having control over your money shouldn't cost you anything.

howTo.title: What you can do
howTo.body: With Sito Wallet, you have everything you need to fully control your finances, both digital and physical, thanks to its simple and powerful tools.

steps.title: Currencies
items: Edit their details when values change or if you want to update their name or symbol.
Delete the ones you no longer use to keep your app clean.
View all your currencies in one place to know which currencies you are using.

steps.title: Accounts
items: Add physical accounts (cash, banks) or digital accounts (PayPal, cryptocurrencies).
Modify details such as initial balance, name, or account type.
View and organize all your accounts clearly.

steps.title: Transaction Categories
items: Create categories to organize your income and expenses (e.g., Food, Freelance Work).
Edit names and descriptions to match your way of classifying transactions.
List all categories to have an organized view of your finances.

steps.title: Transactions
items: Record income and expenses with all details (date, amount, category, account).
Edit transactions if you made a mistake or want to update information.
Check your history to analyze how and where your money is moving.

sections.body: Sito Wallet is a free application with the goal of helping you manage and organize your finances (digital and physical) in one place. The app provides tools to manage currencies, accounts, transaction categories, and transactions. Sito Wallet is offered completely free of charge.

sections.body:
